class.rdfs:comment: A food or drink item listed in a menu or menu section.
class.rdfs:label: MenuItem

schema:nutrition.rdfs:comment: Nutrition information about the recipe or menu item.
schema:nutrition.rdfs:label: nutrition

schema:offers.rdfs:comment: An offer to provide this item—for example, an offer to sell a product, rent the DVD of a movie, perform a service, or give away tickets to an event.
schema:offers.rdfs:label: offers

schema:suitableForDiet.rdfs:comment: Indicates a dietary restriction or guideline for which this recipe or menu item is suitable, e.g. diabetic, halal etc.
schema:suitableForDiet.rdfs:label: suitableForDiet
